name: doctorother
text: The way Nice Pete explains things, they SEEM rational.  He says them so logically.  But . . . uh . . . yeah.

name: spinynorman
text: Rachel Ray uses a similar amound of hand motions.

name: professoryes
text: Rachel Ray and Nice Pete. That, ladies and gentlemen, is the juxtaposition of the century.

name: spinynorman
text:
Nice Pete doesn't have her crazy ass Joker-face grin.

Bitch just might be crazier than ol' Pete.

But at least he is not of Low Mind.

name: professorhazard
text: Didn't he attempt to hunt her down in a recent blog?

name: spinynorman
text: Because she was of Low Mind, yes. She insulted sun-caught perch.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Also, she stole his cutting board idea. Nice Pete will not tolerate a thief of Low Mind.

name: pgroove
text: has anyone else noticed how far pat sticks the neck of the bottle into his mouth?

name: tekende
text: No homo

name: spenham
text: A comment left by spenham was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by atom, snowman, Courtland, king_of_pwns, jimbob, dracer2, amadaun)

name: spenham
text: Alas, to commend a fellow on his exquisite vocabulary is to suffer the slings and arrows of outraged Achewood fans.

name: foetus_punch
text: Nah, "juxtaposition" just isn't that cool of a word to use. Look...In a stunning juxtaposition of concepts, famous artist Famos Amos has created a visual art piece showing footage of the Rwanda genocide with the theme song from the Fresh Prince of Belair played over it. There ya go. Do I get a chubby?

name: professoryes
text: Yes. Yes you do.

name: professoryes
text: Clearly it is. We must enact progressive change upon these comments.

name: nyu
text: A comment left by nyu was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesus, Jonathan, last_tuesday, STUART)

name: bixschmix
text: Nice Pete has no time for thoughts of small mind such as yours.

name: perplexagon
text: The hand gestures at the end really make this one.

name: a_dude
text: nice pete has his priorities in order.

name: sargasm
text: "It's kind of like rocket fuel!" is how I describe any sufficiently strong liquor that I take a shot of.

name: stuart
text: Jesus Christ, Pat's face in that panel.

name: divot
text: Damn! That's crizappy!

name: atmus
text: It has the uptown prison flavor that keeps you ugly all night long!

name: kickstart
text: Gazizza, my dilznoofus.

name: ttagxamm
text: Reicpe for Nice Pete's Raisin Schnapps.

name: ttagxamm
text: * Nice Pete's Raisin Schnapps may hinder spelling ability * "Youll' get to like it!"

name: charchar
text: Prison wine is usually called "Pruno" and it's often hidden in toilet taks while ir ferments.  It is often described using words like "Robotussinish" and "hella nasty."

name: locuscosecant
text: set your background color to something other than white then look at this strip

name: terriblerobot
text: Oh good, I thought something was broken. Now I like to imagine that it is Nice Pete's insanity, sucking all the light from the strip.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Nice Pete really doesn't seem the "Seriously Pat"-type.

name: professoryes
text:
Maybe he thought Pat was joking about something.

Oh Pat. Even in the slammer with a murderer, you've got some strong opinions.

name: boredom_man
text: Perhaps Pete made a joke about poisoning someone immediately before offering the liquor.

name: phthoggos
text: the problem is that you are imagining him saying it with any expression in his voice whatsoever.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Your avatar looks disturbingly like Nice Pete. Except, of course, for the hat.

name: tekende
text: I have to wonder if Nice Pete actually has some sort of method designed to make the cutting boards not hold DNA evidence, or if he just has the idea and thinks that's all he needs.

name: tekende
text: He will hire a kind of...engineer, if you will, to actually make the boards.

name: origotoshi
text: He will also use that guy to test whether or not the boards hold DNA.

name: niraj
text: Nice Pete has a stare that looks directly at your soul and then tells it that he's going to kill it

name: the_dude
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: spinynorman
text: bout sums it up, yep

name: boredom_man
text:
Have you heard Nice Pete's cover of "Hallelujah?"

(It actually sounds just like k.d. lang's.)

name: puguglypress
text: "it's a cold and it's a broken" (cracks egg) "hallelujah" (drops egg into pan, it does not sizzle)

name: dtuba
text: it muft sizzle.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Nope. Pete would gut him like a perch just to put the rest of us out of the misery of that wanna-be hard-man stare.

name: fishies
text: I call that mustache a 'handlebar'

name: shutup_shutup
text: And I disagree.

name: ravindra108
text: Where I'm from, it's a Fu Manchu.

name: soticoto
text: I have a Fu Manchu... and it is nothing like that.

name: wfl
text: Me and my chums in the downtown call it the "Molestache".

name: lolsworth
text: I think we should just call it the "Nice Pete"

name: anzio
text: The proper term would be a 'banger', sir.

name: zapatos
text: Fuck I love what Nice Pete does with his hands.  He is so creepy and awesome.

name: cagliostro
text: That is not what his victims have said. Thus far.

name: aelindil
text: I told this joke at my bridal shower upon receiving a new cutting board.  After that, all I got were nervous looks.

name: turing
text: I would call that mustache a Lemmy except it does not have the sideburns.
